actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize funds for the Department of Commerce for use in the development of the next generation weather radar (NEXRAD).

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations in a specified amount for the next generation weather radar (NEXRAD) development, to enable the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration in the Department of Commerce to carry out its public warning and forecast service duties under the law.

titles.title: A bill to authorize funds for the Department of Commerce for use in the development of the next generation weather radar (NEXRAD).
